name: Metahero
introduce:
Metahero is a 3D scanning technology solution that can create ultra-high-definition personalized avatars and digital items to be used across the metaverse and various industries: medical, fashion, engineering, and more.
Metahero supports to use ultra-HD metascans to generate NFTs (Non-fungible tokens) and earn rolling royalties from selling and trading personal avatars, art, and other 3D models on the Metahero marketplace and secondary markets.
